result.title: 1 Peer-led online communities on facets dimensions
result.description: Create a peer-led community to exchange around public sector innovation implementation challenges, based on the four dimensions of the facets model. This deliverables will focus on structuring and organising each expert community composed by government officials and facet experts; develop online tolls for exchange and a thematic space in the OPSI platform.

result.title: Database of Design related Stakeholders across Europe
result.description: This deliverable will scan several international and national practice-oriented networks, clusters and research-related initiatives that have recently been built or emerged in the domain of Design enabled Innovation across Europe (f.i. DESIS, Fuori Salone Milano, SEiSMiC, SI-Drive, Social Innovation Europe, Benisi, SozialMarie, New Europe, Project for Public Spaces etc.) to include respective actors and stakeholders in the DESIGNSCAPES mailing list, to be published on the project website, and used for the invitations to participate in the Technical and Financial Support Instrument of WP3.

result.title: Communication and Dissemination Plan v4
result.description: The Communication and Dissemination plan will detail the stages and process involved in the promotion and awareness raising of the project including the dissemination of information among target groups (quadruple helix) with the ability to contribute to the innovation and success of the project. This information will be shared through-out the duration of the project, highlighting its goals, objectives and activities, in all cases respecting any IPR restrictions.
